Summary: Animate component properties between states with WithAnimation(). Simple, declarative transitions for opacity, scale, position, and more.
Remarks: Property-based animation (RxAnimation) animates changes to component properties when state toggles. Call WithAnimation() on the component to tween previously-set animatable properties (e.g., .Opacity(...), .Scale(...)). Customize duration and easing by parameters to WithAnimation. You can still use standard .NET MAUI animations by getting a native control reference, but WithAnimation is the simplest MVU-friendly option.
